characters.name: Hog Rider
characters.description: Fast Melee troop that targets buildings and can jump over the river. He followed the echoing call of 'HOG RIDERRRRR' all the way throguh the arena doors.

characters.name: Valkyrie
characters.description: Tough Melee fighter, deals area damage around her. Swarm or horde, no problem! She can take them all out with a few spins.

characters.name: Musketeer
characters.description: Don't be fooled by her delicately coiffed hair, the Musketeer is a mean shot with her trusty boomstick.

characters.name: Goblins
characters.description: Three fast, unarmored melee attackers. Small, fast, green and mean!

characters.name: Zap
characters.description: Zaps enemies, briefly stunning them and dealing damage inside a small radius. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

characters.name: Torando
characters.description: Drags enemy troops to its center while dealing damage over time, just like a magnet. A big, swirling Tornado-y magnet. Doesn't effect buildings.

characters.name: Barbarians
characters.description: A horde of melee attackers with mean mustaches and even meaner tempers.

characters.name: Snowball
characters.description: It's HUGE! Once it began rolling down Frozen Peak, There was no stopping it. Enemies hit are knocked back and slowed down.
